entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 02:58 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
